name: The Long Dark Original Soundtrack
summary: The Long Dark Original Soundtrack is the soundtrack to The Long Dark, composed by Cris Velasco and Sascha Dikiciyan. Volume 1 includes the soundtracks from episode one and two from Wintermute as well as Survival Mode. There are a total of 80 tracks and is 100 minutes (1 hour, 40 minutes) long. It was originally released on August 28, 2017.
info:
• 中文名: 漫漫长夜原声集
  • 发售日期: August 28, 2017
  • 播放时长: 100 minutes
